code: @Test public void testDefaultRepositoryConfiguration() {     this.contextRunner.withUserConfiguration(TestConfiguration.class).run((context) -> {         assertThat(context).hasSingleBean(CityRepository.class).         assertThat(context).hasSingleBean(MongoClient.class).         MongoMappingContext mappingContext = context.getBean(MongoMappingContext.class).         @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")         Set<? extends Class<?>> entities = (Set<? extends Class<?>>) ReflectionTestUtils.getField(mappingContext, "initialEntitySet").         assertThat(entities).hasSize(1).     }). }
